definition: thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91
contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
to revise the current edition/revised edition
page of a publication (e.g. newspaper or website)/printing space (reserved for some content)/page layout

sentences.english: The shooting script was actually based on two scripts (written separately by Welles and Mankiewicz) that Welles combined into one for the final version.
sentences.chinese: 威爾斯最終用的是他和曼凱維支寫的劇本的混編版。

sentences.english: Achieved by the stock version of the software applications on the Internet.
sentences.chinese: 實現了圖文版股票分析軟件在互聯網上的應用。

sentences.english: This is a preview, not the V1 release.
sentences.chinese: 這依舊是一個預覽版，並非V1版。

sentences.english: If the system can use NESYS upgrade for the Japanese version of the arcade.
sentences.chinese: 如果利用NESYS系統能爲日本版街機升級。

sentences.english: What persuaded you to start Global Voices in Bangla?
sentences.chinese: 是什麼使你決心開展孟加拉版的全球之聲？

sentences.english: Tabletop displays commercially available are the size of a coffee table.
sentences.chinese: 商用版的桌面顯示器有一張咖啡桌那麼大。

sentences.english: Results All the results of tests were consistent with the requirment of Chp. 2000.
sentences.chinese: 結果產品質量符合中國藥典2000版二部標準。

sentences.english: The mobile version is still awaiting approval from Apple.
sentences.chinese: 手機版目前正在等待蘋果的批准。

sentences.english: The second version also has wider and deeper knurling on the focusing ring than the previous version.
sentences.chinese: 第二版調焦環上的棱比前一版更寬更深。

sentences.english: This is the original scroll version.
sentences.chinese: 而這本是最初版，完全照手稿印出來的。

sentences.english: The Aztecs, Maya, And Their Predecessors, 4Th Edition.
sentences.chinese: 阿茲特克人，瑪雅人和他們的前輩，第4版。

sentences.english: Rising antivirus software 2006 Ultimate Edition seventh generation antivirus engine.
sentences.chinese: 瑞星殺毒軟件2006版採用第七代極速殺毒引擎。

sentences.english: To this day, countless cover versions of the song are played in clubs and at parties.
sentences.chinese: 到今天，俱樂部和派對上放過不計其數的翻唱版。

sentences.english: METHODS The test based on the method in 2~(nd) book of China pharmacopoeia, 2000.
sentences.chinese: 方法中國藥典2000版二部細菌內毒素檢測法。

sentences.english: This HTML page is built into the add-on and is included in both the desktop and the mobile version.
sentences.chinese: 桌面版和移動版的擴展都有這個頁面。

sentences.english: Internal walls are lined with wood panelling that forms a warm, neutral backdrop to the space.
sentences.chinese: 建築內牆採用木質鑲嵌版營造出一個溫暖中立的空間。

definition: section/paragraph/funds/CL:筆|笔[bi3],個|个[ge4]/classifier for versions or models (of a product)
to push out/to release/to launch/to publish/to recommend
similar (model)/merchandise similar to that used by a celebrity etc
